sn12:4.3.3_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:

sn12:4.4.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12:4.4.2_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati bhavo hoti, kiṁpaccayā bhavo’ti?
sn12:4.4.3_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12:4.4.4_0: ‘upādāne kho sati bhavo hoti, upādānapaccayā bhavo’ti.
sn12:4.5.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:

sn12:4.5.4_0: ‘taṇhāya kho sati upādānaṁ hoti, taṇhāpaccayā upādānan’ti.

sn12:4.6.4_0: ‘vedanāya kho sati taṇhā hoti, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā’ti.
sn12:4.7.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12:4.7.2_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati vedanā hoti, kiṁpaccayā vedanā’ti?

sn12:4.7.4_0: ‘phasse kho sati vedanā hoti, phassapaccayā vedanā’ti.

sn12:4.8.4_0: ‘saḷāyatane kho sati phasso hoti, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso’ti.
sn12:4.9.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:

sn12:4.9.4_0: ‘nāmarūpe kho sati saḷāyatanaṁ hoti, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanan’ti.
sn12:4.10.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:

sn12:11.1.3_0: “cattārome, bhikkhave, āhārā bhūtānaṁ vā sattānaṁ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṁ vā anuggahāya.
sn12:11.1.5_0: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṁ catutthaṁ.
sn12:11.1.6_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro āhārā bhūtānaṁ vā sattānaṁ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṁ vā anuggahāya.
sn12:11.2.1_0: Ime, bhikkhave, cattāro āhārā kiṁnidānā kiṁsamudayā kiṁjātikā kiṁpabhavā?
sn12:11.2.2_0: Ime cattāro āhārā taṇhānidānā taṇhāsamudayā taṇhājātikā taṇhāpabhavā.
sn12:11.2.3_0: Taṇhā cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, kiṁnidānā kiṁsamudayā kiṁjātikā kiṁpabhavā?
sn12:11.2.5_0: Vedanā cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, kiṁnidānā kiṁsamudayā kiṁjātikā kiṁpabhavā?
sn12:11.2.7_0: Phasso cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo?
sn12:11.2.9_0: Saḷāyatanañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, kiṁnidānaṁ kiṁsamudayaṁ kiṁjātikaṁ kiṁpabhavaṁ?
sn12:11.2.11_0: Nāmarūpañcidaṁ, bhikkhave, kiṁnidānaṁ kiṁsamudayaṁ kiṁjātikaṁ kiṁpabhavaṁ?

sn12:11.2.15_0: Saṅkhārā cime, bhikkhave, kiṁnidānā kiṁsamudayā kiṁjātikā kiṁpabhavā?
sn12:12.1.2_0: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, āhārā bhūtānaṁ vā sattānaṁ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṁ vā anuggahāya.
sn12:12.1.4_0: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṁ catutthaṁ.

sn12:12.2.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā moḷiyaphagguno bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:

sn12:12.2.9_0: ‘kissa nu kho, bhante, viññāṇāhāro’ti, esa kallo pañho.
sn12:12.3.7_0: Evaṁ maṁ avadantaṁ yo evaṁ puccheyya:
sn12:12.3.8_0: ‘kiṁpaccayā nu kho, bhante, phasso’ti, esa kallo pañho.

sn12:12.5.8_0: ‘kiṁpaccayā nu kho, bhante, taṇhā’ti, esa kallo pañho.

sn12:12.7.1_0: Channaṁ tveva, phagguna, phassāyatanānaṁ asesavirāganirodhā phassanirodho;

sn12:14.3.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ime dhamme pajānanti,
sn12:14.4.13_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā,
sn12:14.4.13_4: Te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
sn12:15.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā kaccānagotto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12:15.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā kaccānagotto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:15.1.4_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sammādiṭṭhi hotī”ti?
sn12:15.2.2_0: Lokasamudayaṁ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā sā na hoti.
sn12:15.2.3_0: Lokanirodhaṁ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passato yā loke atthitā sā na hoti.
sn12:15.2.5_0: Tañcāyaṁ upayupādānaṁ cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṁ abhinivesānusayaṁ na upeti na upādiyati nādhiṭṭhāti:
sn12:15.2.6_1: dukkhaṁ nirujjhamānaṁ nirujjhatī’ti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati aparapaccayā ñāṇamevassa ettha hoti.
sn12:15.3.3_0: Ete te, kaccāna, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti:
sn12:16.1.2_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12:16.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:16.1.4_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhammakathiko hotī”ti?
sn12:16.2.1_0: “Jarāmaraṇassa ce bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṁ deseti,
sn12:16.2.2_0: Jarāmaraṇassa ce bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti,
sn12:16.2.3_0: Jarāmaraṇassa ce bhikkhu nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādāvimutto hoti,
sn12:16.3.11_0: avijjāya ce bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṁ deseti,
sn12:16.3.12_0: Avijjāya ce bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti,
sn12:16.3.13_0: Avijjāya ce bhikkhu nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādāvimutto hoti,
sn12:17.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn12:17.1.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn12:17.1.4_0: Addasā kho acelo kassapo bhagavantaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
sn12:17.1.5_0: Disvāna yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
sn12:17.1.6_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
sn12:17.1.6_1: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho acelo kassapo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:17.1.7_1: sace no bhavaṁ gotamo okāsaṁ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
sn12:17.2.1_0: Dutiyampi kho acelo kassapo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:17.2.2_1: sace no bhavaṁ gotamo okāsaṁ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
sn12:17.2.7_0: Evaṁ vutte, acelo kassapo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:17.2.8_0: “na kho pana mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ bahudeva pucchitukāmā”ti.
sn12:17.3.5_0: ‘Kiṁ nu kho, bho gotama, sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca dukkhan’ti?
sn12:17.3.7_0: ‘Kiṁ pana, bho gotama, asayaṅkāraṁ aparaṅkāraṁ adhiccasamuppannaṁ dukkhan’ti?
sn12:17.3.9_0: ‘Kiṁ nu kho, bho gotama, natthi dukkhan’ti?
sn12:17.3.12_0: ‘Tena hi bhavaṁ gotamo dukkhaṁ na jānāti, na passatī’ti.
sn12:17.3.13_0: ‘Na khvāhaṁ, kassapa, dukkhaṁ na jānāmi, na passāmi.
sn12:17.4.1_0: “Kiṁ nu kho, bho gotama, ‘sayaṅkataṁ dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṁ, kassapā’ti vadesi.
sn12:17.4.2_0: ‘Kiṁ pana, bho gotama, paraṅkataṁ dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṁ, kassapā’ti vadesi.
sn12:17.4.3_2: sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṁ,
sn12:17.4.4_2: asayaṅkāraṁ aparaṅkāraṁ adhiccasamuppannaṁ dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṁ,
sn12:17.4.5_2: natthi dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho, kassapa,
sn12:17.4.6_0: ‘Tena hi bhavaṁ gotamo dukkhaṁ na jānāti na passatī’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na khvāhaṁ, kassapa,
sn12:17.4.9_0: Ācikkhatu ca me, bhante, bhagavā dukkhaṁ.
sn12:17.4.10_0: Desetu ca me, bhante, bhagavā dukkhan”ti.
sn12:17.5.1_1: ādito sato ‘sayaṅkataṁ dukkhan’ti iti vadaṁ sassataṁ etaṁ pareti.
sn12:17.5.2_1: vedanābhitunnassa sato ‘paraṅkataṁ dukkhan’ti iti vadaṁ ucchedaṁ etaṁ pareti.
sn12:17.5.3_0: Ete te, kassapa, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti:
sn12:17.6.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, acelo kassapo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:17.6.4_0: Esāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn12:17.6.5_0: Labheyyāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, labheyyaṁ upasampadan”ti.
sn12:17.7.1_4: Catunnaṁ māsānaṁ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājenti upasampādenti bhikkhubhāvāya.
sn12:17.8.1_4: Catunnaṁ māsānaṁ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājenti upasampādenti bhikkhubhāvāya.
sn12:17.8.1_6: catunnaṁ vassānaṁ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājentu upasampādentu bhikkhubhāvāyā”ti.
sn12:17.9.1_0: Alattha kho acelo kassapo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, alattha upasampadaṁ.
sn12:17.9.2_0: Acirūpasampanno ca panāyasmā kassapo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya
sn12:17.9.2_1: kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme
sn12:17.9.3_0: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn12:17.9.4_0: Aññataro ca panāyasmā kassapo arahataṁ ahosīti.
sn12:18.1.2_0: Atha kho timbaruko paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
sn12:18.1.3_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn12:18.1.3_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho timbaruko paribbājako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:18.2.1_0: “Kiṁ nu kho, bho gotama, sayaṅkataṁ sukhadukkhanti?
sn12:18.2.3_0: Kiṁ pana, bho gotama, paraṅkataṁ sukhadukkhanti?
sn12:18.2.5_0: Kiṁ nu kho, bho gotama, sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca sukhadukkhanti?
sn12:18.2.7_0: Kiṁ pana, bho gotama, asayaṅkāraṁ aparaṅkāraṁ adhiccasamuppannaṁ sukhadukkhanti?
sn12:18.2.9_0: Kiṁ nu kho, bho gotama, natthi sukhadukkhanti?
sn12:18.2.12_0: Tena hi bhavaṁ gotamo sukhadukkhaṁ na jānāti, na passatīti?
sn12:18.2.13_0: Na khvāhaṁ, timbaruka, sukhadukkhaṁ na jānāmi, na passāmi.
sn12:18.3.1_2: sayaṅkataṁ sukhadukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṁ,
sn12:18.3.2_0: ‘Kiṁ pana, bho gotama, paraṅkataṁ sukhadukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṁ, timbarukā’ti vadesi.
sn12:18.3.3_2: sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca sukhadukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṁ,
sn12:18.3.4_2: asayaṅkāraṁ aparaṅkāraṁ adhiccasamuppannaṁ sukhadukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṁ,
sn12:18.3.5_2: natthi sukhadukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho,
sn12:18.3.7_0: ‘Tena hi bhavaṁ gotamo sukhadukkhaṁ na jānāti,
sn12:18.3.7_1: na passatī’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na khvāhaṁ,
sn12:18.3.10_0: Ācikkhatu ca me bhavaṁ gotamo sukhadukkhaṁ.
sn12:18.3.11_0: Desetu ca me bhavaṁ gotamo sukhadukkhan”ti.
sn12:18.4.1_3: ādito sato ‘sayaṅkataṁ sukhadukkhan’ti evampāhaṁ na vadāmi.
sn12:18.4.2_3: vedanābhitunnassa sato ‘paraṅkataṁ sukhadukkhan’ti evampāhaṁ na vadāmi.
sn12:18.4.3_0: Ete te, timbaruka, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti:
sn12:18.5.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, timbaruko paribbājako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:18.5.3_0: esāhaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn12:18.5.4_0: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
sn12:19.1.2_0: “Avijjānīvaraṇassa, bhikkhave, bālassa taṇhāya sampayuttassa evamayaṁ kāyo samudāgato.
sn12:19.1.3_0: Iti ayañceva kāyo bahiddhā ca nāmarūpaṁ,
sn12:19.1.3_3: yehi phuṭṭho bālo sukhadukkhaṁ paṭisaṁvedayati etesaṁ vā aññatarena.
sn12:19.2.1_0: Avijjānīvaraṇassa, bhikkhave, paṇḍitassa taṇhāya sampayuttassa evamayaṁ kāyo samudāgato.
sn12:19.2.2_0: Iti ayañceva kāyo bahiddhā ca nāmarūpaṁ,
sn12:19.2.2_3: yehi phuṭṭho paṇḍito sukhadukkhaṁ paṭisaṁvedayati etesaṁ vā aññatarena.
sn12:19.3.1_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, ko viseso ko adhippayāso kiṁ nānākaraṇaṁ paṇḍitassa bālenā”ti?
sn12:19.4.1_0: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn12:19.4.2_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn12:19.5.1_2: avijjāya nivutassa bālassa yāya ca taṇhāya sampayuttassa ayaṁ kāyo samudāgato,
sn12:19.5.1_3: sā ceva avijjā bālassa appahīnā sā ca taṇhā aparikkhīṇā.
sn12:19.5.3_0: Na, bhikkhave, bālo acari brahmacariyaṁ sammā dukkhakkhayāya.
sn12:19.5.4_0: Tasmā bālo kāyassa bhedā kāyūpago hoti,
sn12:19.5.5_0: so kāyūpago samāno na parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi.
sn12:19.6.1_2: avijjāya nivutassa paṇḍitassa yāya ca taṇhāya sampayuttassa ayaṁ kāyo samudāgato,
sn12:19.6.3_0: Acari, bhikkhave, paṇḍito brahmacariyaṁ sammā dukkhakkhayāya.
sn12:19.6.4_0: Tasmā paṇḍito kāyassa bhedā na kāyūpago hoti.
sn12:19.6.5_0: So akāyūpago samāno parimuccati jātiyā jarāmaraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi.
sn12:19.6.7_3: idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ paṇḍitassa bālena yadidaṁ brahmacariyavāso”ti.
sn12:20.1.2_0: “Paṭiccasamuppādañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi paṭiccasamuppanne ca dhamme.
sn12:20.1.3_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn12:20.1.4_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn12:20.2.3_0: Uppādā vā tathāgatānaṁ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṁ,
sn12:20.2.3_1: ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā idappaccayatā.
sn12:20.2.5_0: Abhisambujjhitvā abhisametvā ācikkhati deseti paññāpeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti.
sn12:20.3.11_0: uppādā vā tathāgatānaṁ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṁ,
sn12:20.3.11_1: ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā idappaccayatā.
sn12:20.3.13_0: Abhisambujjhitvā abhisametvā ācikkhati deseti paññāpeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti.
sn12:20.3.16_0: Iti kho, bhikkhave, yā tatra tathatā avitathatā anaññathatā idappaccayatā—
sn12:20.4.2_2: aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhammaṁ.
sn12:20.4.3_2: aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā.
sn12:20.4.4_2: anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo.
sn12:20.4.13_2: aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā nirodhadhammā.
sn12:20.5.1_3: ime ca paṭiccasamuppannā dhammā’ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā honti,
sn12:20.5.2_4: kiṁ hutvā kiṁ ahosiṁ nu kho ahaṁ atītamaddhānan’ti;
sn12:20.5.4_4: kiṁ hutvā kiṁ bhavissāmi nu kho ahaṁ anāgatamaddhānan’ti;
sn12:20.5.5_0: etarahi vā paccuppannaṁ addhānaṁ ajjhattaṁ kathaṅkathī bhavissati:
sn12:20.5.6_4: ayaṁ nu kho satto kuto āgato,
sn12:20.5.9_2: ariyasāvakassa ayañca paṭiccasamuppādo ime ca paṭiccasamuppannā dhammā yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhā”ti.
sn12:21.1.2_2: tathāgato catūhi ca vesārajjehi samannāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti,
sn12:21.1.3_0: iti rūpaṁ iti rūpassa samudayo iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo,
sn12:21.1.4_0: iti vedanā iti vedanāya samudayo iti vedanāya atthaṅgamo,
sn12:21.1.5_0: iti saññā iti saññāya samudayo iti saññāya atthaṅgamo,
sn12:21.1.6_0: iti saṅkhārā iti saṅkhārānaṁ samudayo iti saṅkhārānaṁ atthaṅgamo,
sn12:21.1.7_0: iti viññāṇaṁ iti viññāṇassa samudayo iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo.
sn12:21.1.8_0: Iti imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti, imassuppādā idaṁ uppajjati.
sn12:21.1.9_0: Imasmiṁ asati idaṁ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṁ nirujjhati.
sn12:22.1.2_2: tathāgato catūhi ca vesārajjehi samannāgato āsabhaṁ ṭhānaṁ paṭijānāti,
sn12:22.1.3_0: ‘iti rūpaṁ iti rūpassa samudayo iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo,
sn12:22.1.4_0: iti vedanā iti vedanāya samudayo iti vedanāya atthaṅgamo,
sn12:22.1.5_0: iti saññā iti saññāya samudayo iti saññāya atthaṅgamo,
sn12:22.1.6_0: iti saṅkhārā iti saṅkhārānaṁ samudayo iti saṅkhārānaṁ atthaṅgamo,
sn12:22.1.7_0: iti viññāṇaṁ iti viññāṇassa samudayo iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo.
sn12:22.1.8_0: Iti imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti, imassuppādā idaṁ uppajjati;
sn12:22.1.9_0: imasmiṁ asati idaṁ na hoti imassa nirodhā idaṁ nirujjhati.
sn12:22.2.1_0: Evaṁ svākkhāto, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo uttāno vivaṭo pakāsito chinnapilotiko.
sn12:22.2.2_2: mayā dhamme uttāne vivaṭe pakāsite chinnapilotike alameva saddhāpabbajitena kulaputtena vīriyaṁ ārabhituṁ:
sn12:22.2.3_0: ‘kāmaṁ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu,
sn12:22.2.3_2: Yaṁ taṁ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṁ,
sn12:22.2.3_3: na taṁ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
sn12:22.3.1_2: kusīto viharati vokiṇṇo pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi,
sn12:22.3.2_2: sukhaṁ viharati pavivitto pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi,
sn12:22.3.3_0: Na, bhikkhave, hīnena aggassa patti hoti.
sn12:22.3.4_0: Aggena ca kho, bhikkhave, aggassa patti hoti.
sn12:22.3.7_0: ‘Evaṁ no ayaṁ amhākaṁ pabbajjā avañjhā bhavissati saphalā saudrayā.
sn12:22.3.8_0: Yesañca mayaṁ paribhuñjāma cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ tesaṁ te kārā amhesu mahapphalā bhavissanti mahānisaṁsā’ti—
sn12:22.3.10_0: Attatthaṁ vā hi, bhikkhave, sampassamānena alameva appamādena sampādetuṁ;
sn12:22.3.11_0: paratthaṁ vā hi, bhikkhave, sampassamānena alameva appamādena sampādetuṁ;
sn12:22.3.12_0: ubhayatthaṁ vā hi, bhikkhave, sampassamānena alameva appamādena sampādetun”ti.
sn12:23.1.2_0: “Jānato ahaṁ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṁ khayaṁ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
sn12:23.1.3_0: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti?
sn12:23.1.4_0: Iti rūpaṁ iti rūpassa samudayo iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo,
sn12:23.1.8_0: iti viññāṇaṁ iti viññāṇassa samudayo iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamoti.
sn12:23.1.9_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
sn12:23.2.1_0: Yampissa taṁ, bhikkhave, khayasmiṁ khayeñāṇaṁ, tampi saupanisaṁ vadāmi, no anupanisaṁ.
sn12:23.2.4_0: Vimuttimpāhaṁ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṁ vadāmi, no anupanisaṁ.
sn12:23.2.7_0: Virāgampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṁ vadāmi, no anupanisaṁ.
sn12:23.2.10_0: Nibbidampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṁ vadāmi, no anupanisaṁ.
sn12:23.2.13_0: Yathābhūtañāṇadassanampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṁ vadāmi, no anupanisaṁ.
sn12:23.2.16_0: Samādhimpāhaṁ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṁ vadāmi, no anupanisaṁ.
sn12:23.3.3_0: Sukhampāhaṁ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṁ vadāmi, no anupanisaṁ.
sn12:23.3.6_0: Passaddhimpāhaṁ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṁ vadāmi, no anupanisaṁ.

sn12:24.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn12:24.1.5_0: Yannūnāhaṁ yena aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ ārāmo tenupasaṅkameyyan”ti.
sn12:24.2.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ ārāmo tenupasaṅkami;
sn12:24.2.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṁ sammodi.
sn12:24.2.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn12:24.2.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ te aññatitthiyā paribbājakā etadavocuṁ:
sn12:24.3.1_0: “Santāvuso sāriputta, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkataṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti.
sn12:24.3.2_0: Santi panāvuso sāriputta, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā paraṅkataṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti.
sn12:24.3.3_0: Santāvuso sāriputta, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca dukkhaṁ paññapenti.
sn12:24.3.4_1: eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā asayaṅkāraṁ aparaṅkāraṁ adhiccasamuppannaṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti.
sn12:24.3.5_0: Idha, panāvuso sāriputta, samaṇo gotamo kiṁvādī kimakkhāyī?
sn12:24.3.6_0: Kathaṁ byākaramānā ca mayaṁ vuttavādino ceva samaṇassa gotamassa assāma,
sn12:24.3.6_1: na ca samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ abhūtena abbhācikkheyyāma,
sn12:24.3.6_3: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānupāto gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgaccheyyā”ti?
sn12:24.4.4_0: Iti vadaṁ vuttavādī ceva bhagavato assa,
sn12:24.4.4_3: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānupāto gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgaccheyya.
sn12:24.5.1_0: Tatrāvuso, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkataṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12:24.5.2_0: Yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā paraṅkataṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12:24.5.3_0: Yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca dukkhaṁ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12:24.5.4_0: Yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā asayaṅkāraṁ aparaṅkāraṁ adhiccasamuppannaṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12:24.6.1_1: ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkataṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti,
sn12:24.6.1_2: te vata aññatra phassā paṭisaṁvedissantīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
sn12:24.6.2_0: Yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā paraṅkataṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti,
sn12:24.6.2_1: te vata aññatra phassā paṭisaṁvedissantīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.

sn12:24.6.4_1: te vata aññatra phassā paṭisaṁvedissantīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”ti.
sn12:24.7.1_0: Assosi kho āyasmā ānando āyasmato sāriputtassa tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṁ imaṁ kathāsallāpaṁ.
sn12:24.7.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12:24.7.3_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando yāvatako āyasmato sāriputtassa tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi
sn12:24.7.3_1: saddhiṁ ahosi kathāsallāpo taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato ārocesi.
sn12:24.8.1_0: “Sādhu sādhu, ānanda, yathā taṁ sāriputto sammā byākaramāno byākareyya.
sn12:24.8.2_0: Paṭiccasamuppannaṁ kho, ānanda, dukkhaṁ vuttaṁ mayā.
sn12:24.8.5_0: Iti vadaṁ vuttavādī ceva me assa,
sn12:24.8.5_3: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānupāto gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgaccheyya.
sn12:24.9.1_0: Tatrānanda, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkataṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12:24.9.4_0: yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā asayaṅkāraṁ aparaṅkāraṁ adhiccasamuppannaṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.
sn12:24.10.1_1: yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkataṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti,

sn12:24.10.4_0: yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā asayaṅkāraṁ aparaṅkāraṁ adhiccasamuppannaṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti,
sn12:24.10.4_1: te vata aññatra phassā paṭisaṁvedissantīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
sn12:24.11.1_0: Ekamidāhaṁ, ānanda, samayaṁ idheva rājagahe viharāmi veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn12:24.11.2_0: Atha khvāhaṁ, ānanda, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisiṁ.
sn12:24.11.5_0: Yannūnāhaṁ yena aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ ārāmo tenupasaṅkameyyan’ti.
sn12:24.12.1_2: upasaṅkamitvā tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṁ sammodiṁ.
sn12:24.12.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁ.
sn12:24.13.1_0: ‘Santāvuso gotama, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkataṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti.
sn12:24.13.2_0: Santi panāvuso gotama, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā paraṅkataṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti.
sn12:24.13.3_0: Santāvuso gotama, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca dukkhaṁ paññapenti.
sn12:24.13.4_1: eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā asayaṅkāraṁ aparaṅkāraṁ adhiccasamuppannaṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti.
sn12:24.13.5_0: Idha no āyasmā gotamo kiṁvādī kimakkhāyī?

sn12:24.14.1_0: Evaṁ vuttāhaṁ, ānanda, te aññatitthiye paribbājake etadavocaṁ:
sn12:24.14.5_0: Iti vadaṁ vuttavādī ceva me assa,
sn12:24.14.5_3: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānupāto gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgaccheyyāti.
sn12:24.15.1_0: Tatrāvuso, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavādā sayaṅkataṁ dukkhaṁ paññapenti tadapi phassapaccayā.

sn12:24.17.2_0: Yatra hi nāma ekena padena sabbo attho vutto bhavissati.
sn12:24.17.3_0: Siyā nu kho, bhante, esevattho vitthārena vuccamāno gambhīro ceva assa gambhīrāvabhāso cā”ti?
sn12:24.18.3_0: ‘jarāmaraṇaṁ, āvuso ānanda, kiṁnidānaṁ kiṁsamudayaṁ kiṁjātikaṁ kiṁpabhavan’ti?
sn12:24.18.5_0: ‘jarāmaraṇaṁ kho, āvuso, jātinidānaṁ jātisamudayaṁ jātijātikaṁ jātipabhavan’ti.
sn12:24.19.2_0: ‘jāti panāvuso ānanda, kiṁnidānā kiṁsamudayā kiṁjātikā kiṁpabhavā’ti?
sn12:24.19.4_0: ‘jāti kho, āvuso, bhavanidānā bhavasamudayā bhavajātikā bhavappabhavā’ti.
sn12:24.20.2_0: ‘bhavo panāvuso ānanda, kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo’ti?
sn12:24.20.4_0: ‘bhavo kho, āvuso, upādānanidāno upādānasamudayo upādānajātiko upādānappabhavo’ti.
sn12:24.21.6_0: ‘phasso panāvuso ānanda, kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo’ti?
sn12:24.21.8_0: ‘phasso kho, āvuso, saḷāyatananidāno saḷāyatanasamudayo saḷāyatanajātiko saḷāyatanappabhavo’ti.
sn12:25.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā bhūmijo sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;

sn12:25.2.6_3: na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānupāto gārayhaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgaccheyyā”ti?

sn12:31.1.2_0: Tatra kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ āmantesi:
sn12:31.3.1_0: Imassa nu kho, sāriputta, saṅkhittena bhāsitassa kathaṁ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?

sn12:31.7.3_0: Bhūtamidanti yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā bhūtassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.

sn12:31.8.5_0: Tadāhārasambhavanti yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā āhārasambhavassa nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto hoti.

sn12:31.8.9_0: Iti kho, bhante, yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ pārāyane ajitapañhe:
sn12:31.10.1_0: Imassa khvāhaṁ, bhante, saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmī”ti.

sn12:32.1.2_0: Atha kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
sn12:32.1.3_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn12:32.1.3_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:32.1.4_0: “moḷiyaphagguno, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhu sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto”ti.
sn12:32.1.5_0: “Na hi nūna so āyasmā imasmiṁ dhammavinaye assāsamalatthā”ti.
sn12:32.2.1_0: “Tena hāyasmā sāriputto imasmiṁ dhammavinaye assāsaṁ patto”ti?
sn12:32.5.1_0: Atha kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12:32.5.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho kaḷārakhattiyo bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:32.5.3_0: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāmī”ti.
sn12:32.6.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ āmantesi:
sn12:32.6.2_0: “ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena sāriputtaṁ āmantehi:
sn12:32.6.4_1: bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
sn12:32.6.6_1: āvuso”ti kho āyasmā sāriputto tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12:32.6.6_3: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn12:32.6.8_0: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāmī”ti?
sn12:32.6.9_0: “Na kho, bhante, etehi padehi etehi byañjanehi attho vutto”ti.
sn12:32.6.12_0: ‘na kho, bhante, etehi padehi etehi byañjanehi attho vutto’”ti.
sn12:32.7.2_0: ‘kathaṁ jānatā pana tayā, āvuso sāriputta, kathaṁ passatā aññā byākatā—
sn12:32.7.3_0: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
sn12:32.7.4_0: Evaṁ puṭṭho tvaṁ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12:32.8.2_0: ‘kathaṁ jānatā pana tayā, āvuso sāriputta, kathaṁ passatā aññā byākatā—
sn12:32.8.3_0: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti;
sn12:32.8.5_0: ‘yaṁnidānā, āvuso, jāti, tassa nidānassa khayā khīṇasmiṁ khīṇāmhīti viditaṁ.
sn12:32.8.7_0: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
sn12:32.9.2_0: ‘jāti panāvuso sāriputta, kiṁnidānā kiṁsamudayā kiṁjātikā kiṁpabhavā’ti?
sn12:32.9.3_0: Evaṁ puṭṭho taṁ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12:32.9.5_0: ‘jāti panāvuso sāriputta, kiṁnidānā kiṁsamudayā kiṁjātikā kiṁpabhavā’ti?
sn12:32.9.7_0: ‘jāti kho, āvuso, bhavanidānā bhavasamudayā bhavajātikā bhavappabhavā’ti.
sn12:32.10.2_0: ‘bhavo panāvuso sāriputta, kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo’ti?
sn12:32.10.3_0: Evaṁ puṭṭho tvaṁ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12:32.10.5_0: ‘bhavo panāvuso sāriputta, kiṁnidāno kiṁsamudayo kiṁjātiko kiṁpabhavo’ti?
sn12:32.10.7_0: ‘bhavo kho, āvuso, upādānanidāno upādānasamudayo upādānajātiko upādānappabhavo’ti.
sn12:32.11.3_0: sace pana taṁ, sāriputta, evaṁ puccheyyuṁ—
sn12:32.11.4_0: taṇhā panāvuso sāriputta, kiṁnidānā kiṁsamudayā kiṁjātikā kiṁpabhavā’ti?
sn12:32.11.5_0: Evaṁ puṭṭho tvaṁ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12:32.11.7_0: ‘taṇhā panāvuso sāriputta, kiṁnidānā kiṁsamudayā kiṁjātikā kiṁpabhavā’ti?
sn12:32.11.9_0: ‘taṇhā kho, āvuso, vedanānidānā vedanāsamudayā vedanājātikā vedanāpabhavā’ti.
sn12:32.12.2_0: ‘kathaṁ jānato pana te, āvuso sāriputta, kathaṁ passato yā vedanāsu nandī sā na upaṭṭhāsī’ti.
sn12:32.12.3_0: Evaṁ puṭṭho tvaṁ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12:32.12.5_2: kathaṁ passato yā vedanāsu nandī sā na upaṭṭhāsī’ti evaṁ puṭṭhohaṁ, bhante,
sn12:32.12.8_0: Sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
sn12:32.12.9_0: Imā kho, āvuso, tisso vedanā aniccā.
sn12:32.12.11_0: viditaṁ, yā vedanāsu nandī sā na upaṭṭhāsī’ti.
sn12:32.13.2_0: Ayampi kho, sāriputta, pariyāyo, etasseva atthassa saṅkhittena veyyākaraṇāya:
sn12:32.14.2_0: ‘kathaṁ vimokkhā pana tayā, āvuso sāriputta, aññā byākatā—
sn12:32.14.3_0: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti?
sn12:32.14.4_0: Evaṁ puṭṭho tvaṁ, sāriputta, kinti byākareyyāsī”ti?
sn12:32.14.6_0: ‘kathaṁ vimokkhā pana tayā, āvuso sāriputta, aññā byākatā—
sn12:32.14.7_0: khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
sn12:32.14.9_1: sabbupādānakkhayā tathā sato viharāmi yathā sataṁ viharantaṁ āsavā nānussavanti,
sn12:32.15.2_0: Ayampi kho sāriputta, pariyāyo etasseva atthassa saṅkhittena veyyākaraṇāya—
sn12:32.15.3_0: ye āsavā samaṇena vuttā tesvāhaṁ na kaṅkhāmi, te me pahīnāti na vicikicchāmī”ti.
sn12:32.15.5_0: Idaṁ vatvā sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
sn12:32.16.1_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto acirapakkantassa bhagavato bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn12:32.16.2_0: “pubbe appaṭisaṁviditaṁ maṁ, āvuso, bhagavā paṭhamaṁ pañhaṁ apucchi, tassa me ahosi dandhāyitattaṁ.
sn12:32.16.3_0: Yato ca kho me, āvuso, bhagavā paṭhamaṁ pañhaṁ anumodi, tassa mayhaṁ, āvuso, etadahosi—
sn12:32.16.4_0: divasañcepi maṁ bhagavā etamatthaṁ puccheyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi,
sn12:32.16.4_1: divasampāhaṁ bhagavato etamatthaṁ byākareyyaṁ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi.
sn12:32.16.5_0: Rattiñcepi maṁ bhagavā etamatthaṁ puccheyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi,
sn12:32.16.5_1: rattimpāhaṁ bhagavato etamatthaṁ byākareyyaṁ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi.
sn12:32.16.6_0: Rattindivaṁ cepi maṁ bhagavā etamatthaṁ puccheyya aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi,
sn12:32.16.6_1: rattindivampāhaṁ bhagavato etamatthaṁ byākareyyaṁ aññamaññehi padehi aññamaññehi pariyāyehi.

sn12:35.1.5_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:

sn12:37.1.3_0: Purāṇamidaṁ, bhikkhave, kammaṁ abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ vedaniyaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
sn12:37.2.1_0: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaññeva sādhukaṁ yoniso manasi karoti:
sn12:37.2.2_0: ‘iti imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti, imassuppādā idaṁ uppajjati;
sn12:37.2.3_0: imasmiṁ asati idaṁ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṁ nirujjhati, yadidaṁ—
sn12:38.1.2_0: “Yañca, bhikkhave, ceteti yañca pakappeti yañca anuseti, ārammaṇametaṁ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
sn12:38.1.4_0: Tasmiṁ patiṭṭhite viññāṇe virūḷhe āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti hoti.
sn12:38.1.5_0: Āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā sati āyatiṁ jāti jarāmaraṇaṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti.
sn12:38.2.1_0: No ce, bhikkhave, ceteti no ce pakappeti, atha ce anuseti, ārammaṇametaṁ hoti viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā.
sn12:38.2.3_0: Tasmiṁ patiṭṭhite viññāṇe virūḷhe āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti hoti.

sn12:38.3.1_2: no ceva ceteti no ca pakappeti no ca anuseti,
sn12:38.3.2_0: Ārammaṇe asati patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa na hoti.
sn12:38.3.3_0: Tadappatiṭṭhite viññāṇe avirūḷhe āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti na hoti.

sn12:41.1.2_0: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12:41.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho anāthapiṇḍikaṁ gahapatiṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn12:41.2.1_1: ariyasāvakassa pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti,
sn12:41.2.1_3: ariyo cassa ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho,
sn12:41.3.1_0: Katamāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti?
sn12:41.3.2_1: pāṇātipātī pāṇātipātapaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati,
sn12:41.3.2_4: pāṇātipātā paṭiviratassa evaṁ taṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ vūpasantaṁ hoti.
sn12:41.4.1_1: adinnādāyī adinnādānapaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati,
sn12:41.4.1_4: adinnādānā paṭiviratassa evaṁ taṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ vūpasantaṁ hoti.
sn12:41.5.1_1: kāmesumicchācārī kāmesumicchācārapaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati,
sn12:41.5.1_4: kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviratassa evaṁ taṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ vūpasantaṁ hoti.
sn12:41.6.1_1: musāvādī musāvādapaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati,
sn12:41.6.1_4: musāvādā paṭiviratassa evaṁ taṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ vūpasantaṁ hoti.
sn12:41.7.1_1: surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyī surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānapaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati,
sn12:41.7.1_4: surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratassa evaṁ taṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ vūpasantaṁ hoti.
sn12:41.7.2_0: Imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti.
sn12:41.8.2_0: Idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti:
sn12:41.8.3_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
sn12:41.9.2_0: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī’ti.
sn12:41.10.2_5: esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā’ti.
sn12:41.11.1_0: Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi acchiddehi asabalehi akammāsehi bhujissehi viññuppasatthehi aparāmaṭṭhehi samādhisaṁvattanikehi.
sn12:41.12.1_0: Katamo cassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho?
sn12:41.12.2_0: Idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaññeva sādhukaṁ yoniso manasi karoti:
sn12:41.12.3_0: ‘iti imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti, imasmiṁ asati idaṁ na hoti;
sn12:41.12.4_0: imassuppādā idaṁ uppajjati, imassa nirodhā idaṁ nirujjhati.
sn12:41.12.11_0: Ayamassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho.
sn12:41.13.1_1: ariyasāvakassa imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti,

sn12:45.6.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bhagavato upassuti ṭhito hoti.
sn12:45.6.2_0: Addasā kho bhagavā taṁ bhikkhuṁ upassuti ṭhitaṁ.
sn12:46.1.2_0: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
sn12:46.1.3_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn12:46.1.3_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:46.2.1_0: “Kiṁ nu kho, bho gotama, so karoti so paṭisaṁvedayatī”ti?
sn12:46.2.2_0: “‘So karoti so paṭisaṁvedayatī’ti kho, brāhmaṇa, ayameko anto”.
sn12:46.3.1_0: “Kiṁ pana, bho gotama, añño karoti, añño paṭisaṁvedayatī”ti?
sn12:46.3.2_0: “‘Añño karoti, añño paṭisaṁvedayatī’ti kho, brāhmaṇa, ayaṁ dutiyo anto.
sn12:46.3.3_0: Ete te, brāhmaṇa, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti:
sn12:46.4.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:46.4.3_0: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
sn12:47.1.2_0: Atha kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12:47.1.2_2: ekamantaṁ nisinno kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:47.3.2_0: “‘Sabbaṁ natthī’ti kho, brāhmaṇa, ayaṁ dutiyo anto.
sn12:47.3.3_0: Ete te, brāhmaṇa, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti:
sn12:47.4.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:48.1.2_0: Atha kho lokāyatiko brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā …pe…

sn12:48.6.1_0: Ete te, brāhmaṇa, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṁ deseti:
sn12:48.7.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, lokāyatiko brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:49.1.4_0: kismiṁ sati kiṁ hoti, kissuppādā kiṁ uppajjati?
sn12:49.2.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sutavato ariyasāvakassa aparappaccayā ñāṇamevettha hoti:
sn12:49.2.2_0: ‘imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti, imassuppādā idaṁ uppajjati.
sn12:49.3.1_0: Na, bhikkhave, sutavato ariyasāvakassa evaṁ hoti:
sn12:49.3.3_0: kismiṁ asati kiṁ na hoti, kissa nirodhā kiṁ nirujjhati?
sn12:49.4.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sutavato ariyasāvakassa aparappaccayā ñāṇamevettha hoti:
sn12:49.4.2_0: ‘imasmiṁ asati idaṁ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṁ nirujjhati.
sn12:49.5.1_2: ariyasāvako evaṁ lokassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti,
sn12:50.1.3_0: ‘kiṁ nu kho kismiṁ sati kiṁ hoti, kissuppādā kiṁ uppajjati?
sn12:50.2.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sutavato ariyasāvakassa aparappaccayā ñāṇamevettha hoti:
sn12:50.2.2_0: ‘imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti, imassuppādā idaṁ uppajjati.
sn12:50.3.1_0: Na, bhikkhave, sutavato ariyasāvakassa evaṁ hoti:
sn12:50.3.2_0: ‘kiṁ nu kho kismiṁ asati kiṁ na hoti, kissa nirodhā kiṁ nirujjhati?
sn12:50.4.1_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, sutavato ariyasāvakassa aparappaccayā ñāṇamevettha hoti:
sn12:50.4.2_0: ‘imasmiṁ asati idaṁ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṁ nirujjhati.
sn12:50.5.1_2: ariyasāvako evaṁ lokassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti,
sn12:51.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn12:51.2.1_2: bhikkhu parivīmaṁsamāno parivīmaṁseyya sabbaso sammā dukkhakkhayāyā”ti?
sn12:51.2.3_0: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn12:51.2.4_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn12:51.3.2_0: ‘yaṁ kho idaṁ anekavidhaṁ nānappakārakaṁ dukkhaṁ loke uppajjati jarāmaraṇaṁ;
sn12:51.3.3_0: idaṁ nu kho dukkhaṁ kiṁnidānaṁ kiṁsamudayaṁ kiṁjātikaṁ kiṁpabhavaṁ?
sn12:51.3.4_0: Kismiṁ sati jarāmaraṇaṁ hoti, kismiṁ asati jarāmaraṇaṁ na hotī’ti?
sn12:51.3.6_0: ‘yaṁ kho idaṁ anekavidhaṁ nānappakārakaṁ dukkhaṁ loke uppajjati jarāmaraṇaṁ,
sn12:51.3.6_1: idaṁ kho dukkhaṁ jātinidānaṁ jātisamudayaṁ jātijātikaṁ jātippabhavaṁ.
sn12:51.3.7_0: Jātiyā sati jarāmaraṇaṁ hoti, jātiyā asati jarāmaraṇaṁ na hotī’ti.
sn12:51.4.1_3: yā ca jarāmaraṇanirodhasāruppagāminī paṭipadā tañca pajānāti,
sn12:51.4.2_0: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso sammā dukkhakkhayāya paṭipanno jarāmaraṇanirodhāya.
sn12:51.5.5_0: bhave sati jāti hoti, bhave asati jāti na hotī’ti.
sn12:51.6.1_3: yā ca jātinirodhasāruppagāminī paṭipadā tañca pajānāti,
sn12:51.6.2_0: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso sammā dukkhakkhayāya paṭipanno jātinirodhāya.
sn12:51.7.10_0: saṅkhārā panime kiṁnidānā kiṁsamudayā kiṁjātikā kiṁpabhavā;
sn12:51.7.11_0: kismiṁ sati saṅkhārā honti, kismiṁ asati saṅkhārā na hontī’ti?
sn12:51.7.14_0: avijjāya sati saṅkhārā honti, avijjāya asati saṅkhārā na hontī’ti.
sn12:51.8.1_3: yā ca saṅkhāranirodhasāruppagāminī paṭipadā tañca pajānāti,
sn12:51.8.2_0: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso sammā dukkhakkhayāya paṭipanno saṅkhāranirodhāya.
sn12:51.9.2_0: Apuññañce saṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti, apuññūpagaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ.
sn12:51.9.3_0: Āneñjañce saṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti āneñjūpagaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ.
sn12:51.9.4_2: bhikkhuno avijjā pahīnā hoti vijjā uppannā,
sn12:51.9.4_3: so avijjāvirāgā vijjuppādā neva puññābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti na apuññābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti na āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharoti.
sn12:51.9.5_0: Anabhisaṅkharonto anabhisañcetayanto na kiñci loke upādiyati;
sn12:51.9.6_0: anupādiyaṁ na paritassati, aparitassaṁ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati.
sn12:51.9.7_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
sn12:51.10.2_0: Dukkhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, sā aniccāti pajānāti, anajjhositāti pajānāti, anabhinanditāti pajānāti.
sn12:51.10.4_0: So sukhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, visaṁyutto naṁ vedayati.
sn12:51.10.5_0: Dukkhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, visaṁyutto naṁ vedayati.
sn12:51.10.6_0: Adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṁ vedayati, visaṁyutto naṁ vedayati.
sn12:51.11.1_0: So kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayamāno kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmīti pajānāti,
sn12:51.11.1_1: jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayamāno jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmīti pajānāti.
sn12:51.11.2_0: Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṁ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissanti,
sn12:51.12.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso kumbhakārapākā uṇhaṁ kumbhaṁ uddharitvā same bhūmibhāge paṭisisseyya.
sn12:51.12.2_0: Tatra yāyaṁ usmā sā tattheva vūpasameyya, kapallāni avasisseyyuṁ.
sn12:51.12.3_2: bhikkhu kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayamāno kāyapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmīti pajānāti,
sn12:51.12.3_3: jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayamāno jīvitapariyantikaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmīti pajānāti.
sn12:51.12.4_0: Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṁ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissanti,
sn12:51.13.2_0: api nu kho khīṇāsavo bhikkhu puññābhisaṅkhāraṁ vā abhisaṅkhareyya apuññābhisaṅkhāraṁ vā abhisaṅkhareyya āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṁ vā abhisaṅkhareyyā”ti?
sn12:51.14.1_0: “Sabbaso vā pana saṅkhāresu asati, saṅkhāranirodhā api nu kho viññāṇaṁ paññāyethā”ti?
sn12:51.15.1_0: “Sabbaso vā pana viññāṇe asati, viññāṇanirodhā api nu kho nāmarūpaṁ paññāyethā”ti?
sn12:51.16.1_0: “Sabbaso vā pana nāmarūpe asati, nāmarūpanirodhā api nu kho saḷāyatanaṁ paññāyethā”ti?
sn12:51.17.1_0: “Sabbaso vā pana saḷāyatane asati, saḷāyatananirodhā api nu kho phasso paññāyethā”ti?
sn12:51.18.1_0: “Sabbaso vā pana phasse asati, phassanirodhā api nu kho vedanā paññāyethā”ti?
sn12:51.19.1_0: “Sabbaso vā pana vedanāya asati, vedanānirodhā api nu kho taṇhā paññāyethā”ti?
sn12:51.20.1_0: “Sabbaso vā pana taṇhāya asati, taṇhānirodhā api nu kho upādānaṁ paññāyethā”ti?
sn12:51.21.1_0: “Sabbaso vā pana upādāne asati, upādānanirodhā api nu kho bhavo paññāyethā”ti.
sn12:51.22.1_0: “Sabbaso vā pana bhave asati, bhavanirodhā api nu kho jāti paññāyethā”ti?
sn12:51.23.1_0: “Sabbaso vā pana jātiyā asati, jātinirodhā api nu kho jarāmaraṇaṁ paññāyethā”ti?
sn12:51.24.1_0: “Sādhu sādhu, bhikkhave, evametaṁ, bhikkhave, netaṁ aññathā.
sn12:51.24.2_0: Saddahatha me taṁ, bhikkhave, adhimuccatha, nikkaṅkhā ettha hotha nibbicikicchā.
sn12:52.1.2_0: “Upādāniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino viharato taṇhā pavaḍḍhati.
sn12:52.2.1_2: dasannaṁ vā kaṭṭhavāhānaṁ vīsāya vā kaṭṭhavāhānaṁ tiṁsāya vā kaṭṭhavāhānaṁ cattārīsāya vā kaṭṭhavāhānaṁ mahāaggikkhandho jaleyya.
sn12:52.2.2_0: Tatra puriso kālena kālaṁ sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
sn12:52.2.3_0: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, mahāaggikkhandho tadāhāro tadupādāno ciraṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ jaleyya.
sn12:52.2.4_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, upādāniyesu dhammesu assādānupassino viharato taṇhā pavaḍḍhati.
sn12:52.3.1_0: Upādāniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu ādīnavānupassino viharato taṇhā nirujjhati.
sn12:52.4.1_2: dasannaṁ vā kaṭṭhavāhānaṁ vīsāya vā tiṁsāya vā cattārīsāya vā kaṭṭhavāhānaṁ mahāaggikkhandho jaleyya;
sn12:52.4.2_0: tatra puriso na kālena kālaṁ sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
sn12:52.4.3_2: mahāaggikkhandho purimassa ca upādānassa pariyādānā aññassa ca anupahārā anāhāro nibbāyeyya.
sn12:52.4.4_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, upādāniyesu dhammesu ādīnavānupassino viharato taṇhā nirujjhati,
sn12:53.1.2_0: “Saṁyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino viharato taṇhā pavaḍḍhati.
sn12:53.2.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, telañca paṭicca vaṭṭiñca paṭicca telappadīpo jhāyeyya.

sn12:53.2.3_0: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, telappadīpo tadāhāro tadupādāno ciraṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ jaleyya.
sn12:53.2.4_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, saṁyojaniyesu dhammesu assādānupassino viharato taṇhā pavaḍḍhati.
sn12:53.3.1_0: Saṁyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu ādīnavānupassino viharato taṇhā nirujjhati.

sn12:54.1.4_0: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, telappadīpo tadāhāro tadupādāno ciraṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ jaleyya.
sn12:54.1.5_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, saṁyojaniyesu dhammesu assādānupassino viharato taṇhā pavaḍḍhati.
sn12:54.2.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, telañca paṭicca vaṭṭiñca paṭicca telappadīpo jhāyeyya.
sn12:54.2.2_0: Tatra puriso na kālena kālaṁ telaṁ āsiñceyya na vaṭṭiṁ upasaṁhareyya.
sn12:54.2.3_2: telappadīpo purimassa ca upādānassa pariyādānā aññassa ca anupahārā anāhāro nibbāyeyya.
sn12:54.2.4_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, saṁyojaniyesu dhammesu ādīnavānupassino viharato taṇhā nirujjhati.
sn12:55.1.2_0: “Upādāniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assādānupassino viharato taṇhā pavaḍḍhati.
sn12:55.2.2_0: Tassa yāni ceva mūlāni adhogamāni, yāni ca tiriyaṅgamāni, sabbāni tāni uddhaṁ ojaṁ abhiharanti.
sn12:55.2.3_0: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, mahārukkho tadāhāro tadupādāno ciraṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ tiṭṭheyya.
sn12:55.2.4_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, upādāniyesu dhammesu assādānupassino viharato taṇhā pavaḍḍhati.
sn12:55.3.1_0: Upādāniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu ādīnavānupassino viharato taṇhā nirujjhati.

sn12:61.3.1_2: assutavā puthujjano imaṁ cātumahābhūtikaṁ kāyaṁ attato upagaccheyya,

sn12:61.3.3_3: vassāni tiṭṭhamāno pañcapi vassāni tiṭṭhamāno dasapi vassāni tiṭṭhamāno vīsatipi vassāni tiṭṭhamāno tiṁsampi
sn12:61.3.3_4: vassāni tiṭṭhamāno cattārīsampi vassāni tiṭṭhamāno paññāsampi vassāni tiṭṭhamāno vassasatampi tiṭṭhamāno,
sn12:61.4.1_5: taṁ rattiyā ca divasassa ca aññadeva uppajjati aññaṁ nirujjhati.

sn12:61.4.3_5: taṁ rattiyā ca divasassa ca aññadeva uppajjati aññaṁ nirujjhati.
sn12:61.5.1_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaṁyeva sādhukaṁ yoniso manasi karoti:
sn12:61.5.2_0: ‘iti imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti, imassuppādā idaṁ uppajjati;
sn12:61.5.3_0: imasmiṁ asati idaṁ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṁ nirujjhati—
sn12:61.6.2_0: nibbindaṁ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati, vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.

sn12:63.1.2_0: “cattārome, bhikkhave, āhārā bhūtānaṁ vā sattānaṁ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṁ vā anuggahāya.
sn12:63.1.4_0: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṁ catutthaṁ.
sn12:63.1.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro āhārā bhūtānaṁ vā sattānaṁ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṁ vā anuggahāya.
sn12:63.2.2_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, dve jāyampatikā parittaṁ sambalaṁ ādāya kantāramaggaṁ paṭipajjeyyuṁ.
sn12:63.2.4_2: dvinnaṁ jāyampatikānaṁ kantāragatānaṁ yā parittā sambalamattā,
sn12:63.2.6_0: Atha kho tesaṁ, bhikkhave, dvinnaṁ jāyampatikānaṁ evamassa:
sn12:63.2.7_0: ‘amhākaṁ kho yā parittā sambalamattā sā parikkhīṇā pariyādiṇṇā.
sn12:63.2.9_0: Yannūna mayaṁ imaṁ ekaputtakaṁ piyaṁ manāpaṁ vadhitvā vallūrañca soṇḍikañca karitvā puttamaṁsāni khādantā evaṁ taṁ kantārāvasesaṁ nitthareyyāma,
sn12:63.2.10_2: dve jāyampatikā taṁ ekaputtakaṁ piyaṁ manāpaṁ vadhitvā vallūrañca soṇḍikañca karitvā puttamaṁsāni khādantā evaṁ taṁ kantārāvasesaṁ nitthareyyuṁ.
sn12:63.2.11_0: Te puttamaṁsāni ceva khādeyyuṁ, ure ca paṭipiseyyuṁ:
sn12:63.3.2_0: api nu te davāya vā āhāraṁ āhāreyyuṁ,
sn12:63.3.4_0: “Nanu te, bhikkhave, yāvadeva kantārassa nittharaṇatthāya āhāraṁ āhāreyyun”ti?
sn12:63.3.6_0: “‘Evameva khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, kabaḷīkāro āhāro daṭṭhabbo’ti vadāmi.
sn12:63.3.7_0: Kabaḷīkāre, bhikkhave, āhāre pariññāte pañca kāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññāto hoti.
sn12:63.3.8_0: Pañca kāmaguṇike rāge pariññāte natthi taṁ saṁyojanaṁ yena saṁyojanena saṁyutto ariyasāvako puna imaṁ lokaṁ āgaccheyya.
sn12:63.4.2_3: Ye kuṭṭanissitā pāṇā te naṁ khādeyyuṁ.
sn12:63.4.3_0: Rukkhañce nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye rukkhanissitā pāṇā te naṁ khādeyyuṁ.
sn12:63.4.4_0: Udakañce nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye udakanissitā pāṇā te naṁ khādeyyuṁ.
sn12:63.4.5_0: Ākāsañce nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye ākāsanissitā pāṇā te naṁ khādeyyuṁ.
sn12:63.4.6_0: Yaṁ yadeva hi sā, bhikkhave, gāvī niccammā nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye tannissitā pāṇā te naṁ khādeyyuṁ.
sn12:63.4.8_0: Phasse, bhikkhave, āhāre pariññāte tisso vedanā pariññātā honti.
sn12:63.4.9_0: Tīsu vedanāsu pariññātāsu ariyasāvakassa natthi kiñci uttarikaraṇīyanti vadāmi.
sn12:63.5.2_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, aṅgārakāsu sādhikaporisā puṇṇā aṅgārānaṁ vītaccikānaṁ vītadhūmānaṁ.
sn12:63.5.3_0: Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo.
sn12:63.5.4_0: Tamenaṁ dve balavanto purisā nānābāhāsu gahetvā taṁ aṅgārakāsuṁ upakaḍḍheyyuṁ.
sn12:63.5.5_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa ārakāvassa cetanā ārakā patthanā ārakā paṇidhi.
sn12:63.5.8_0: ‘imañcāhaṁ aṅgārakāsuṁ papatissāmi, tatonidānaṁ maraṇaṁ vā nigacchāmi maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhan’ti.
sn12:63.5.10_0: Manosañcetanāya, bhikkhave, āhāre pariññāte tisso taṇhā pariññātā honti.
sn12:63.5.11_0: Tīsu taṇhāsu pariññātāsu ariyasāvakassa natthi kiñci uttarikaraṇīyanti vadāmi.
sn12:63.6.2_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, coraṁ āgucāriṁ gahetvā rañño dasseyyuṁ:
sn12:63.6.3_0: ‘ayaṁ te, deva, coro āgucārī, imassa yaṁ icchasi taṁ daṇḍaṁ paṇehī’ti.
sn12:63.6.5_0: ‘gacchatha, bho, imaṁ purisaṁ pubbaṇhasamayaṁ sattisatena hanathā’ti.
sn12:63.6.11_0: ‘gacchatha, bho, taṁ purisaṁ majjhanhikasamayaṁ sattisatena hanathā’ti.
sn12:63.6.17_0: ‘gacchatha, bho, taṁ purisaṁ sāyanhasamayaṁ sattisatena hanathā’ti.
sn12:63.6.20_0: api nu so puriso divasaṁ tīhi sattisatehi haññamāno tatonidānaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvediyethā”ti?
sn12:63.6.21_0: “Ekissāpi, bhante, sattiyā haññamāno tatonidānaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvediyetha;
sn12:63.6.22_0: ko pana vādo tīhi sattisatehi haññamāno”ti.
sn12:63.6.24_3: nāmarūpe pariññāte ariyasāvakassa natthi kiñci uttarikaraṇīyanti vadāmī”ti.
sn12:64.1.2_0: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, āhārā bhūtānaṁ vā sattānaṁ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṁ vā anuggahāya.
sn12:64.1.4_0: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṁ catutthaṁ.
sn12:64.1.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro āhārā bhūtānaṁ vā sattānaṁ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṁ vā anuggahāya.
sn12:64.2.1_2: āhāre atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi taṇhā,
sn12:64.2.2_0: Yattha patiṭṭhitaṁ viññāṇaṁ virūḷhaṁ, atthi tattha nāmarūpassa avakkanti.
sn12:64.2.3_0: Yattha atthi nāmarūpassa avakkanti, atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi.
sn12:64.2.4_0: Yattha atthi saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi, atthi tattha āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti.
sn12:64.2.5_0: Yattha atthi āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti, atthi tattha āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ.
sn12:64.2.6_0: Yattha atthi āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇaṁ, sasokaṁ taṁ, bhikkhave, sadaraṁ saupāyāsanti vadāmi.
sn12:64.3.3_2: āhāre atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi taṇhā,

sn12:64.3.6_0: Yattha atthi saṅkhārānaṁ vuddhi, atthi tattha āyatiṁ punabbhavābhinibbatti.

sn12:64.4.1_3: vā phalake bhittiyā vā dussapaṭṭe vā itthirūpaṁ vā purisarūpaṁ vā abhinimmineyya sabbaṅgapaccaṅgaṁ;

sn12:65.1.2_0: “Pubbe me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn12:65.1.3_0: ‘kicchā vatāyaṁ loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca.
sn12:65.1.4_0: Atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṁ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassa.
sn12:65.1.5_0: Kudāssu nāma imassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāyissati jarāmaraṇassā’ti?
sn12:65.1.7_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṁ hoti, kiṁpaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti?
sn12:65.1.8_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12:65.1.9_0: ‘jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṁ hoti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti.
sn12:65.2.11_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12:65.2.12_0: ‘viññāṇe kho sati nāmarūpaṁ hoti, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpan’ti.
sn12:65.2.14_0: ‘kimhi nu kho sati viññāṇaṁ hoti, kiṁpaccayā viññāṇan’ti?
sn12:65.2.15_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12:65.2.16_0: ‘nāmarūpe kho sati viññāṇaṁ hoti, nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇan’ti.
sn12:65.3.2_0: paccudāvattati kho idaṁ viññāṇaṁ nāmarūpamhā na paraṁ gacchati.
sn12:65.3.3_0: Ettāvatā jāyetha vā jīyetha vā mīyetha vā cavetha vā upapajjetha vā,
sn12:65.3.8_3: pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi ñāṇaṁ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
sn12:65.4.2_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati, jarāmaraṇaṁ na hoti;
sn12:65.4.4_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12:65.4.8_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jāti na hoti …pe…
sn12:65.4.17_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12:65.5.2_0: ‘kimhi nu kho asati viññāṇaṁ na hoti;
sn12:65.5.4_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12:65.6.2_0: adhigato kho myāyaṁ maggo bodhāya yadidaṁ—
sn12:65.6.8_3: pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi ñāṇaṁ udapādi paññā udapādi vijjā udapādi āloko udapādi.
sn12:65.7.1_2: puriso araññe pavane caramāno passeyya purāṇaṁ maggaṁ purāṇañjasaṁ pubbakehi manussehi anuyātaṁ.
sn12:65.7.3_0: Tamanugacchanto passeyya purāṇaṁ nagaraṁ purāṇaṁ rājadhāniṁ pubbakehi manussehi ajjhāvuṭṭhaṁ ārāmasampannaṁ
sn12:65.7.4_0: Atha kho so, bhikkhave, puriso rañño vā rājamahāmattassa vā āroceyya:
sn12:65.7.5_1: jāneyyāsi—ahaṁ addasaṁ araññe pavane caramāno purāṇaṁ maggaṁ purāṇañjasaṁ pubbakehi manussehi anuyātaṁ tamanugacchiṁ.
sn12:65.7.6_0: Tamanugacchanto addasaṁ purāṇaṁ nagaraṁ purāṇaṁ rājadhāniṁ pubbakehi manussehi ajjhāvuṭṭhaṁ ārāmasampannaṁ
sn12:65.7.8_0: Atha kho so, bhikkhave, rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā taṁ nagaraṁ māpeyya.
sn12:65.7.9_0: Tadassa nagaraṁ aparena samayena iddhañceva phītañca bāhujaññaṁ ākiṇṇamanussaṁ vuddhivepullappattaṁ.
sn12:65.7.10_0: Evameva khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, addasaṁ purāṇaṁ maggaṁ purāṇañjasaṁ pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātaṁ.
sn12:65.8.1_0: Katamo ca so, bhikkhave, purāṇamaggo purāṇañjaso pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyāto?
sn12:65.8.4_0: Ayaṁ kho so, bhikkhave, purāṇamaggo purāṇañjaso pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyāto, tamanugacchiṁ;
sn12:65.8.24_0: Tadabhiññāya ācikkhiṁ bhikkhūnaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ upāsakānaṁ upāsikānaṁ.
sn12:65.8.25_2: brahmacariyaṁ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṁ bāhujaññaṁ puthubhūtaṁ yāva devamanussehi suppakāsitan”ti.
sn12:66.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kurūsu viharati kammāsadhammaṁ nāma kurūnaṁ nigamo.
sn12:66.1.8_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:66.1.10_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, sammasasi antaraṁ sammasan”ti?
sn12:66.1.12_0: Yathā so bhikkhu byākāsi na so bhikkhu bhagavato cittaṁ ārādhesi.
sn12:66.2.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:66.2.3_0: yaṁ bhagavā antaraṁ sammasaṁ bhāseyya. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
sn12:66.2.5_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn12:66.3.1_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammasamāno sammasati antaraṁ sammasaṁ:
sn12:66.3.2_0: ‘yaṁ kho idaṁ anekavidhaṁ nānappakārakaṁ dukkhaṁ loke uppajjati jarāmaraṇaṁ.
sn12:66.3.3_0: Idaṁ kho dukkhaṁ kiṁnidānaṁ kiṁsamudayaṁ kiṁjātikaṁ kiṁpabhavaṁ,
sn12:66.3.5_0: ‘yaṁ kho idaṁ anekavidhaṁ nānappakārakaṁ dukkhaṁ loke uppajjati jarāmaraṇaṁ.
sn12:66.3.6_0: Idaṁ kho dukkhaṁ upadhinidānaṁ upadhisamudayaṁ upadhijātikaṁ upadhipabhavaṁ,
sn12:66.3.7_0: So jarāmaraṇañca pajānāti jarāmaraṇasamudayañca pajānāti jarāmaraṇanirodhañca pajānāti yā ca jarāmaraṇanirodhasāruppagāminī paṭipadā tañca pajānāti.
sn12:66.3.9_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso sammā dukkhakkhayāya paṭipanno jarāmaraṇanirodhāya.
sn12:66.4.5_0: So upadhiñca pajānāti upadhisamudayañca pajānāti upadhinirodhañca pajānāti yā ca upadhinirodhasāruppagāminī paṭipadā tañca pajānāti.
sn12:66.4.7_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso sammā dukkhakkhayāya paṭipanno upadhinirodhāya.
sn12:66.5.2_0: ‘taṇhā panāyaṁ kattha uppajjamānā uppajjati, kattha nivisamānā nivisatī’ti?
sn12:66.5.4_0: yaṁ kho loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisati.
sn12:66.5.6_0: Cakkhuṁ loke piyarūpaṁ, sātarūpaṁ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisati.
sn12:66.5.11_0: mano loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati ettha nivisamānā nivisati.
sn12:66.6.1_2: atītamaddhānaṁ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ taṁ niccato addakkhuṁ sukhato addakkhuṁ
sn12:66.6.1_3: attato addakkhuṁ ārogyato addakkhuṁ khemato addakkhuṁ.
sn12:66.6.3_0: Ye taṇhaṁ vaḍḍhesuṁ te upadhiṁ vaḍḍhesuṁ.
sn12:66.6.4_0: Ye upadhiṁ vaḍḍhesuṁ te dukkhaṁ vaḍḍhesuṁ.
sn12:66.6.5_0: Ye dukkhaṁ vaḍḍhesuṁ te na parimucciṁsu jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
sn12:66.7.1_2: anāgatamaddhānaṁ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ taṁ niccato dakkhissanti sukhato
sn12:66.7.1_3: dakkhissanti attato dakkhissanti ārogyato dakkhissanti khemato dakkhissanti.
sn12:66.7.3_0: Ye taṇhaṁ vaḍḍhissanti te upadhiṁ vaḍḍhissanti.
sn12:66.7.4_0: Ye upadhiṁ vaḍḍhissanti te dukkhaṁ vaḍḍhissanti.
sn12:66.7.5_0: Ye dukkhaṁ vaḍḍhissanti te na parimuccissanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
sn12:66.8.1_2: etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ taṁ niccato passanti sukhato passanti attato passanti ārogyato passanti khemato passanti.
sn12:66.8.3_0: Ye taṇhaṁ vaḍḍhenti te upadhiṁ vaḍḍhenti.
sn12:66.8.4_0: Ye upadhiṁ vaḍḍhenti te dukkhaṁ vaḍḍhenti.
sn12:66.8.5_0: Ye dukkhaṁ vaḍḍhenti te na parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
sn12:66.9.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, āpānīyakaṁso vaṇṇasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno.
sn12:66.9.3_0: Atha puriso āgaccheyya ghammābhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipāsito.
sn12:66.9.5_0: ‘ayaṁ te, ambho purisa, āpānīyakaṁso vaṇṇasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno;
sn12:66.9.8_0: Pivato hi kho taṁ chādessati vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi,
sn12:66.9.8_1: pivitvā ca pana tatonidānaṁ maraṇaṁ vā nigacchasi maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhan’ti.
sn12:66.9.9_0: So taṁ āpānīyakaṁsaṁ sahasā appaṭisaṅkhā piveyya, nappaṭinissajjeyya.
sn12:66.9.10_0: So tatonidānaṁ maraṇaṁ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
sn12:66.9.11_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye hi keci atītamaddhānaṁ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṁ loke piyarūpaṁ …pe…
sn12:66.9.13_0: etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ taṁ niccato passanti sukhato passanti attato passanti ārogyato passanti khemato passanti,
sn12:66.9.14_0: Ye taṇhaṁ vaḍḍhenti te upadhiṁ vaḍḍhenti.
sn12:66.9.15_0: Ye upadhiṁ vaḍḍhenti te dukkhaṁ vaḍḍhenti.
sn12:66.9.16_0: Ye dukkhaṁ vaḍḍhenti te na parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
sn12:66.10.1_2: atītamaddhānaṁ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ taṁ aniccato addakkhuṁ dukkhato addakkhuṁ
sn12:66.10.1_3: anattato addakkhuṁ rogato addakkhuṁ bhayato addakkhuṁ,
sn12:66.10.3_0: Ye taṇhaṁ pajahiṁsu te upadhiṁ pajahiṁsu.
sn12:66.10.4_0: Ye upadhiṁ pajahiṁsu te dukkhaṁ pajahiṁsu.
sn12:66.10.5_0: Ye dukkhaṁ pajahiṁsu te parimucciṁsu jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
sn12:66.11.1_2: anāgatamaddhānaṁ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ taṁ aniccato dakkhissanti dukkhato
sn12:66.11.1_3: dakkhissanti anattato dakkhissanti rogato dakkhissanti bhayato dakkhissanti,
sn12:66.12.1_2: etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ taṁ aniccato passanti dukkhato passanti anattato passanti rogato passanti bhayato passanti,
sn12:66.12.3_0: Ye taṇhaṁ pajahanti te upadhiṁ pajahanti.
sn12:66.12.4_0: Ye upadhiṁ pajahanti te dukkhaṁ pajahanti.
sn12:66.12.5_0: Ye dukkhaṁ pajahanti te parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
sn12:66.13.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, āpānīyakaṁso vaṇṇasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno.
sn12:66.13.3_0: Atha puriso āgaccheyya ghammābhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipāsito.
sn12:66.13.5_2: āpānīyakaṁso vaṇṇasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno so ca kho visena saṁsaṭṭho.
sn12:66.13.7_0: Pivato hi kho taṁ chādessati vaṇṇenapi gandhenapi rasenapi;
sn12:66.13.7_1: pivitvā ca pana tatonidānaṁ maraṇaṁ vā nigacchasi maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhan’ti.
sn12:66.13.8_0: Atha kho, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa evamassa:
sn12:66.13.9_0: ‘sakkā kho me ayaṁ surāpipāsitā pānīyena vā vinetuṁ dadhimaṇḍakena vā vinetuṁ bhaṭṭhaloṇikāya vā vinetuṁ loṇasovīrakena vā vinetuṁ,
sn12:66.13.9_2: yaṁ mama assa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā’ti.
sn12:66.13.10_0: So taṁ āpānīyakaṁsaṁ paṭisaṅkhā na piveyya, paṭinissajjeyya.
sn12:66.13.11_0: So tatonidānaṁ na maraṇaṁ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhaṁ.
sn12:66.13.12_2: ye hi keci atītamaddhānaṁ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ taṁ aniccato addakkhuṁ dukkhato
sn12:66.13.12_3: addakkhuṁ anattato addakkhuṁ rogato addakkhuṁ bhayato addakkhuṁ,
sn12:66.13.14_0: Ye taṇhaṁ pajahiṁsu te upadhiṁ pajahiṁsu.
sn12:66.13.15_0: Ye upadhiṁ pajahiṁsu te dukkhaṁ pajahiṁsu.
sn12:66.13.16_0: Ye dukkhaṁ pajahiṁsu te parimucciṁsu jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
sn12:66.14.2_0: etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā yaṁ loke piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ taṁ aniccato passanti dukkhato passanti anattato passanti rogato passanti bhayato passanti,
sn12:66.14.4_0: Ye taṇhaṁ pajahanti te upadhiṁ pajahanti.
sn12:66.14.5_0: Ye upadhiṁ pajahanti te dukkhaṁ pajahanti.
sn12:66.14.6_0: Ye dukkhaṁ pajahanti te parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
sn12:67.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṁ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn12:67.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
sn12:67.1.3_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn12:67.1.3_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:67.2.2_4: na sayaṅkatā ca paraṅkatā ca jāti,
sn12:67.3.1_0: “Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, sayaṅkato bhavo …pe…
sn12:67.5.1_0: “Idāneva kho mayaṁ āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṁ evaṁ ājānāma:
sn12:67.6.1_0: Idāneva ca pana mayaṁ āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṁ evaṁ ājānāma:
sn12:67.7.1_0: Yathā kathaṁ panāvuso sāriputta, imassa bhāsitassa attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?
sn12:67.7.3_0: Upamāyapidhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṁ jānanti.
sn12:67.7.4_0: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, dve naḷakalāpiyo aññamaññaṁ nissāya tiṭṭheyyuṁ.
sn12:67.7.10_0: Tāsañce, āvuso, naḷakalāpīnaṁ ekaṁ ākaḍḍheyya, ekā papateyya;
sn12:67.8.4_0: Idañca pana mayaṁ āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṁ imehi chattiṁsāya vatthūhi anumodāma:
sn12:67.9.1_1: bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṁ deseti,
sn12:67.9.2_1: bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti,
sn12:67.9.3_1: bhikkhu nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto hoti,
sn12:67.9.14_1: bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṁ deseti,
sn12:67.9.15_1: bhikkhu nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti,
sn12:67.9.16_1: bhikkhu nibbidā virāgā nirodhā anupādā vimutto hoti,
sn12:68.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ca musilo āyasmā ca paviṭṭho āyasmā ca nārado āyasmā ca ānando kosambiyaṁ viharanti ghositārāme.
sn12:68.1.2_0: Atha kho āyasmā paviṭṭho āyasmantaṁ musilaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:68.1.3_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā atthāyasmato musilassa paccattameva ñāṇaṁ:
sn12:68.1.5_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā ahametaṁ jānāmi ahametaṁ passāmi:
sn12:68.2.1_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā atthāyasmato musilassa paccattameva ñāṇaṁ:
sn12:68.2.12_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā ahametaṁ jānāmi ahametaṁ passāmi:
sn12:68.3.1_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā atthāyasmato musilassa paccattameva ñāṇaṁ:
sn12:68.3.3_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā ahametaṁ jānāmi ahametaṁ passāmi:
sn12:68.4.1_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā atthāyasmato musilassa paccattameva ñāṇaṁ:
sn12:68.4.12_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā ahametaṁ jānāmi ahametaṁ passāmi:
sn12:68.5.1_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā atthāyasmato musilassa paccattameva ñāṇaṁ:
sn12:68.5.3_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā ahametaṁ jānāmi ahametaṁ passāmi:
sn12:68.6.2_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā musilo tuṇhī ahosi.
sn12:68.7.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā nārado āyasmantaṁ paviṭṭhaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:68.7.7_0: Byākarotu ca me āyasmā nārado etaṁ pañhaṁ.
sn12:68.8.1_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā atthāyasmato nāradassa paccattameva ñāṇaṁ:
sn12:68.8.3_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā ahametaṁ jānāmi ahametaṁ passāmi:
sn12:68.9.1_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā atthāyasmato nāradassa paccattameva ñāṇaṁ—
sn12:68.9.4_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā ahametaṁ jānāmi ahametaṁ passāmi:
sn12:68.10.1_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā atthāyasmato nāradassa paccattameva ñāṇaṁ:
sn12:68.10.3_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā ahametaṁ jānāmi ahametaṁ passāmi:
sn12:68.11.1_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā atthāyasmato nāradassa paccattameva ñāṇaṁ:
sn12:68.11.4_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā ahametaṁ jānāmi ahametaṁ passāmi:
sn12:68.12.1_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā atthāyasmato nāradassa paccattameva ñāṇaṁ:
sn12:68.12.3_2: saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā ahametaṁ jānāmi ahametaṁ passāmi:
sn12:68.13.3_0: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, kantāramagge udapāno, tatra nevassa rajju na udakavārako.
sn12:68.13.4_0: Atha puriso āgaccheyya ghammābhitatto ghammapareto kilanto tasito pipāsito,
sn12:68.13.5_0: Tassa ‘udakan’ti hi kho ñāṇaṁ assa, na ca kāyena phusitvā vihareyya.
sn12:68.14.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṁ paviṭṭhaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:68.14.2_0: “evaṁvādī tvaṁ, āvuso paviṭṭha, āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ kiṁ vadesī”ti?
sn12:68.14.3_0: “Evaṁvādāhaṁ, āvuso ānanda, āyasmantaṁ nāradaṁ na kiñci vadāmi aññatra kalyāṇā aññatra kusalā”ti.
sn12:69.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn12:70.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn12:70.1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ.
sn12:70.1.4_0: Bhikkhusaṅghopi sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ.
sn12:70.1.5_0: Aññatitthiyā pana paribbājakā asakkatā honti agarukatā amānitā apūjitā anapacitā,
sn12:70.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena susimo paribbājako rājagahe paṭivasati mahatiyā paribbājakaparisāya saddhiṁ.
sn12:70.2.2_0: Atha kho susimassa paribbājakassa parisā susimaṁ paribbājakaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn12:70.2.3_0: “ehi tvaṁ, āvuso susima, samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṁ cara.
sn12:70.2.5_0: Taṁ mayaṁ dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇitvā gihīnaṁ bhāsissāma.
sn12:70.2.6_0: Evaṁ mayampi sakkatā bhavissāma garukatā mānitā pūjitā apacitā lābhino cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānan”ti.
sn12:70.2.7_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho susimo paribbājako sakāya parisāya paṭissuṇitvā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
sn12:70.2.8_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn12:70.2.8_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho susimo paribbājako āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:70.2.9_0: “icchāmahaṁ, āvuso ānanda, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye brahmacariyaṁ caritun”ti.
sn12:70.3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando susimaṁ paribbājakaṁ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12:70.3.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:70.3.3_0: ‘icchāmahaṁ, āvuso ānanda, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye brahmacariyaṁ caritun’”ti.
sn12:70.3.5_0: Alattha kho susimo paribbājako bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, alattha upasampadaṁ.
sn12:70.4.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulehi bhikkhūhi bhagavato santike aññā byākatā hoti:
sn12:70.4.2_0: “khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmā”ti.
sn12:70.4.4_0: “sambahulehi kira bhikkhūhi bhagavato santike aññā byākatā:
sn12:70.4.5_0: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāmā”ti.
sn12:70.4.6_0: Atha kho āyasmā susimo yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā tehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ sammodi.
sn12:70.4.7_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
sn12:70.4.7_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā susimo te bhikkhū etadavoca:
sn12:70.4.9_0: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāmā”ti?
sn12:70.5.1_0: “Api pana tumhe āyasmanto evaṁ jānantā evaṁ passantā anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhotha—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotha,
sn12:70.5.1_12: imepi candimasūriye evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve pāṇinā parimasatha parimajjatha,
sn12:70.6.1_0: “Api pana tumhe āyasmanto evaṁ jānantā evaṁ passantā dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya
sn12:70.6.1_1: ubho sadde suṇātha dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike cā”ti?
sn12:70.7.1_0: “Api pana tumhe āyasmanto evaṁ jānantā evaṁ passantā parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānātha—
sn12:70.7.2_0: sarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ sarāgaṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.3_0: vītarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ vītarāgaṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.4_0: sadosaṁ vā cittaṁ sadosaṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.5_0: vītadosaṁ vā cittaṁ vītadosaṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.6_0: samohaṁ vā cittaṁ samohaṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.7_0: vītamohaṁ vā cittaṁ vītamohaṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.8_0: saṅkhittaṁ vā cittaṁ saṅkhittaṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.9_0: vikkhittaṁ vā cittaṁ vikkhittaṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.10_0: mahaggataṁ vā cittaṁ mahaggataṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.11_0: amahaggataṁ vā cittaṁ amahaggataṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.12_0: sauttaraṁ vā cittaṁ sauttaraṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.13_0: anuttaraṁ vā cittaṁ anuttaraṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.14_0: samāhitaṁ vā cittaṁ samāhitaṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.15_0: asamāhitaṁ vā cittaṁ asamāhitaṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.16_0: vimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ vimuttaṁ cittanti pajānātha;
sn12:70.7.17_0: avimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ avimuttaṁ cittanti pajānāthā”ti?
sn12:70.8.1_0: “Api pana tumhe āyasmanto evaṁ jānantā evaṁ passantā anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussaratha,
sn12:70.8.1_1: seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi
sn12:70.8.1_2: jātiyo tiṁsampi jātiyo cattārīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi,
sn12:70.8.1_3: anekepi saṁvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṁvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe:
sn12:70.8.1_4: ‘amutrāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhapaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto,
sn12:70.8.1_6: tatrāpāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhapaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto,
sn12:70.8.1_8: Iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarathā”ti?
sn12:70.9.1_0: “Api pana tumhe āyasmanto evaṁ jānantā evaṁ passantā dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena
sn12:70.9.1_1: satte passatha cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
sn12:70.9.1_3: ‘ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena samannāgatā manoduccaritena samannāgatā,
sn12:70.9.1_5: te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapannā;
sn12:70.9.1_6: ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena samannāgatā manosucaritena samannāgatā,
sn12:70.9.1_7: ariyānaṁ anupavādakā sammādiṭṭhikā sammādiṭṭhikammasamādānā te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapannā’ti,
sn12:70.9.1_8: iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passatha cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe,
sn12:70.10.1_0: “Api pana tumhe āyasmanto evaṁ jānantā evaṁ passantā ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā,
sn12:70.11.1_0: “Ettha dāni āyasmanto idañca veyyākaraṇaṁ imesañca dhammānaṁ asamāpatti; idaṁ no, āvuso, kathan”ti?
sn12:70.12.1_0: “Na khvāhaṁ imassa āyasmantānaṁ saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi.
sn12:70.12.2_0: Sādhu me āyasmanto tathā bhāsantu yathāhaṁ imassa āyasmantānaṁ saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājāneyyan”ti.
sn12:70.12.3_0: “Ājāneyyāsi vā tvaṁ, āvuso susima, na vā tvaṁ ājāneyyāsi atha kho paññāvimuttā mayan”ti.
sn12:70.13.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā susimo uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12:70.13.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā susimo yāvatako tehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ ahosi kathāsallāpo taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato ārocesi.
sn12:70.13.3_0: “Pubbe kho, susima, dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṁ, pacchā nibbāne ñāṇan”ti.
sn12:70.14.1_0: “Na khvāhaṁ, bhante, imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi.
sn12:70.14.2_1: bhagavā tathā bhāsatu yathāhaṁ imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājāneyyan”ti.
sn12:70.15.4_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn12:70.15.6_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn12:70.15.11_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn12:70.15.13_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn12:70.15.20_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn12:70.15.22_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn12:70.15.27_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?
sn12:70.15.29_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, kallaṁ nu taṁ samanupassituṁ:
sn12:70.16.1_1: yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn12:70.16.1_2: sabbaṁ rūpaṁ netaṁ mama nesohamasmi na meso attāti;
sn12:70.16.2_0: Yā kāci vedanā atītānāgatapaccuppannā ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikā vā sukhumā vā hīnā vā paṇītā vā yā dūre santike vā,
sn12:70.16.2_1: sabbā vedanā netaṁ mama nesohamasmi na meso attāti;
sn12:70.16.4_0: ye keci saṅkhārā atītānāgatapaccuppannā ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikā vā sukhumā vā hīnā vā paṇītā vā ye dūre santike vā,
sn12:70.16.4_1: sabbe saṅkhārā netaṁ mama nesohamasmi na meso attāti;
sn12:70.16.5_0: Yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
sn12:70.16.5_1: sabbaṁ viññāṇaṁ netaṁ mama nesohamasmi na meso attāti;
sn12:70.17.2_0: Nibbindaṁ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati, vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
sn12:70.17.3_0: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
sn12:70.20.1_1: evaṁ jānanto evaṁ passanto anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhosi—ekopi hutvā bahudhā hosi,
sn12:70.20.1_13: imepi candimasūriye evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve pāṇinā parimasasi parimajjasi,
sn12:70.21.1_1: evaṁ jānanto evaṁ passanto dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇasi dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike cā”ti?
sn12:70.22.1_1: evaṁ jānanto evaṁ passanto parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāsi—
sn12:70.22.2_0: sarāgaṁ vā cittaṁ sarāgaṁ cittanti pajānāsi …pe…
sn12:70.22.3_0: vimuttaṁ vā cittaṁ vimuttaṁ cittanti pajānāsī”ti?
sn12:70.23.1_1: evaṁ jānanto evaṁ passanto anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarasi,
sn12:70.23.1_3: iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarasī”ti?
sn12:70.24.1_1: evaṁ jānanto evaṁ passanto dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passasi cavamāne …pe…
sn12:70.25.1_1: evaṁ jānanto evaṁ passanto ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā,
sn12:70.26.1_0: “Ettha dāni, susima, idañca veyyākaraṇaṁ imesañca dhammānaṁ asamāpatti, idaṁ no, susima, kathan”ti?
sn12:70.27.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā susimo bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn12:70.27.2_2: yvāhaṁ evaṁ svākkhāte dhammavinaye dhammatthenako pabbajito.
sn12:70.27.3_0: Tassa me, bhante, bhagavā accayaṁ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṁ saṁvarāyā”ti.
sn12:70.28.1_2: yo tvaṁ evaṁ svākkhāte dhammavinaye dhammatthenako pabbajito.
sn12:70.28.2_0: Seyyathāpi, susima, coraṁ āgucāriṁ gahetvā rañño dasseyyuṁ:
sn12:70.28.3_0: ‘ayaṁ te, deva, coro āgucārī, imassa yaṁ icchasi taṁ daṇḍaṁ paṇehī’ti.
sn12:70.28.5_1: imaṁ purisaṁ daḷhāya rajjuyā pacchābāhaṁ gāḷhabandhanaṁ bandhitvā khuramuṇḍaṁ karitvā kharassarena paṇavena
sn12:70.28.5_2: rathiyāya rathiyaṁ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṁ parinetvā dakkhiṇena dvārena nikkhāmetvā dakkhiṇato nagarassa
sn12:70.28.6_0: Tamenaṁ rañño purisā daḷhāya rajjuyā pacchābāhaṁ gāḷhabandhanaṁ bandhitvā khuramuṇḍaṁ karitvā kharassarena
sn12:70.28.6_1: paṇavena rathiyāya rathiyaṁ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṁ parinetvā dakkhiṇena dvārena nikkhāmetvā dakkhiṇato
sn12:70.28.8_0: api nu so puriso tatonidānaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvediyethā”ti?
sn12:70.29.1_0: “Yaṁ kho so, susima, puriso tatonidānaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvediyetha.
sn12:70.29.2_0: Yā evaṁ svākkhāte dhammavinaye dhammatthenakassa pabbajjā,
sn12:70.29.2_1: ayaṁ tato dukkhavipākatarā ca kaṭukavipākatarā ca,
sn12:70.29.3_0: Yato ca kho tvaṁ, susima, accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikarosi taṁ te mayaṁ paṭiggaṇhāma.
sn12:70.29.4_1: ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikaroti,
sn12:71.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn12:71.1.4_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā jarāmaraṇaṁ nappajānanti,
sn12:71.1.5_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā,
sn12:71.1.5_3: na ca pana te āyasmanto sāmaññatthaṁ vā brahmaññatthaṁ vā diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti.
sn12:71.2.1_0: Ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā jarāmaraṇaṁ pajānanti …pe… paṭipadaṁ pajānanti,
sn12:71.2.2_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca brāhmaṇasammatā,
sn12:71.2.2_3: te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
sn12:82.1.2_2: ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ jarāmaraṇe yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇāya satthā pariyesitabbo;
sn12:82.1.3_0: jarāmaraṇasamudayaṁ ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ jarāmaraṇasamudaye yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇāya satthā pariyesitabbo;
sn12:82.1.4_0: jarāmaraṇanirodhaṁ ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ jarāmaraṇanirodhe yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇāya satthā pariyesitabbo;
sn12:82.1.5_0: jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇāya satthā pariyesitabbo”ti.
sn12:92.1.1_2: ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ saṅkhāresu yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇāya satthā pariyesitabbo;
sn12:92.1.2_0: saṅkhārasamudayaṁ ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ saṅkhārasamudaye yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇāya satthā pariyesitabbo;
sn12:92.1.3_0: saṅkhāranirodhaṁ ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ saṅkhāranirodhe yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇāya satthā pariyesitabbo;
sn12:92.1.4_0: saṅkhāranirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ saṅkhāranirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇāya satthā pariyesitabbo”ti.
sn12:93-103.1.1_0: “Jarāmaraṇaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānatā apassatā yathābhūtaṁ jarāmaraṇe yathābhūtaṁ ñāṇāya sikkhā karaṇīyā.
